#Text=Several dead in Oregon college shootings
#Text=Sunday , October 4 , 2015
#Text=Satellite map of the college campus .
#Text=Image : US Geological Survey .
#Text=Nine people were killed on Thursday by 26-year-old Chris Harper Mercer on the campus of Umpqua Community College in Roseburg , Oregon .
#Text=By various reports seven or nine people were also injured .
#Text=Officials said Mercer killed himself during the subsequent shootout with police .
#Text=Mercer began the killing spree in a class where he was a student by shooting the class teacher , and killed eight students in that and at least one other classroom .
#Text=In the next classroom , a student nurse unsuccessfully tried to save the life of her friend who was wounded by the gunman .
#Text=Another student , ex-soldier Chris Mintz , was shot seven times after coming to help .
#Text=The reasons for the attack are not known but CNN reports he singled out people who identified themselves as Christian .
#Text=The BBC noted Mercer may have revealed his plans via social media and possibly left a written statement .
#Text=He briefly served in the US Army in 2008 .

#Text=An ATF ( Bureau of Alcohol , Tobacco , Firearms and Explosives ) agent said authorities found six weapons at the college and a further seven weapons from the gunman 's home , including a shotgun , all of which appear to have been obtained lawfully by Mercer and members of his family .
#Text=State laws permit people to carry concealed weapons in higher education institutions and at least one other person at the college was armed .
#Text=Oregon recently passed a new gun law in response to a shooting incident in 2012 , in which a man used a stolen rifle to murder two other people in a Portland shopping center .
#Text=Somehow this has become routine .
#Text=The reporting is routine .
#Text=My response here at this podium ends up being routine , the conversation in the aftermath of it
#Text=—
#Text=Barack Obama
#Text=Later on Thursday , President Barack Obama spoke for twelve minutes about the incident and called for stricter gun controls in line with other countries like Australia and the United Kingdom .
#Text=Referring to earlier similar shootings , he said " Somehow this has become routine .

#Text=He expressed his belief that there would soon be a  press release " from the pro-gun lobby , who would call for a reduction of gun controls .

column1: #Text=He also predicted there would be criticism levelled at him about his politicization of the matter , but he said " this is something we should politicize . "

#Text=Although no new initiative was outlined , Obama highlighted Congressional opposition which had stopped " the collection of data on shooting incidents " and stated " this is not something I can do myself . "
